query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
account_id as "account_id!: String", 
advertiser_addr as "advertiser_addr!: String", 
status as "status!: CampaignStatus", 
briefing_hash as "briefing_hash!: String", 
briefing_json as "briefing_json!: String", 
budget as "budget!: String", 
price_per_point as "price_per_point!: String", 
max_individual_reward as "max_individual_reward!: String", 
min_individual_reward as "min_individual_reward!: String", 
valid_until as "valid_until!: Option < UtcDateTime >", 
report_hash as "report_hash!: Option < String >", 
created_at as "created_at!: UtcDateTime", 
thumbs_up_only as "thumbs_up_only!: bool", 
force_hydrate as "force_hydrate!: bool", 
total_collabs as "total_collabs!: i32", 
total_spent as "total_spent!: String", 
total_budget as "total_budget!: String", 
impression_count as "impression_count!: i32", 
reply_count as "reply_count!: i32", 
repost_count as "repost_count!: i32", 
like_count as "like_count!: i32" FROM campaigns WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR id = ANY(CAST($4 as int4[])) ) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR account_id = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR advertiser_addr = $8::varchar) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR advertiser_addr LIKE $10::varchar) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR status = $12::campaign_status) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR status != $14::campaign_status) AND (NOT $15::boolean OR briefing_hash = $16::varchar) AND (NOT $17::boolean OR briefing_hash LIKE $18::varchar) AND (NOT $19::boolean OR briefing_json = $20::varchar) AND (NOT $21::boolean OR briefing_json LIKE $22::varchar) AND (NOT $23::boolean OR budget = $24::varchar) AND (NOT $25::boolean OR budget > $26::varchar) AND (NOT $27::boolean OR budget < $28::varchar) AND (NOT $29::boolean OR price_per_point = $30::varchar) AND (NOT $31::boolean OR max_individual_reward = $32::varchar) AND (NOT $33::boolean OR min_individual_reward = $34::varchar) AND (NOT $35::boolean OR valid_until = $36::timestamptz) AND (NOT $37::boolean OR report_hash = $38::varchar) AND (NOT $39::boolean OR created_at = $40::timestamptz) AND (NOT $41::boolean OR thumbs_up_only = $42::boolean) AND (NOT $43::boolean OR force_hydrate = $44::boolean) AND (NOT $45::boolean OR total_collabs = $46::int4) AND (NOT $47::boolean OR total_spent = $48::varchar) AND (NOT $49::boolean OR total_budget = $50::varchar) AND (NOT $51::boolean OR impression_count = $52::int4) AND (NOT $53::boolean OR reply_count = $54::int4) AND (NOT $55::boolean OR repost_count = $56::int4) AND (NOT $57::boolean OR like_count = $58::int4) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($59 = 'Id' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'Id' AND $60) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'AccountId' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN account_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'AccountId' AND $60) WHEN true THEN account_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'AdvertiserAddr' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN advertiser_addr ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'AdvertiserAddr' AND $60) WHEN true THEN advertiser_addr ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'Status' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'Status' AND $60) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'BriefingHash' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN briefing_hash ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'BriefingHash' AND $60) WHEN true THEN briefing_hash ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'BriefingJson' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN briefing_json ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'BriefingJson' AND $60) WHEN true THEN briefing_json ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'Budget' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN budget ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'Budget' AND $60) WHEN true THEN budget ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'PricePerPoint' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN price_per_point ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'PricePerPoint' AND $60) WHEN true THEN price_per_point ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'MaxIndividualReward' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN max_individual_reward ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'MaxIndividualReward' AND $60) WHEN true THEN max_individual_reward ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'MinIndividualReward' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN min_individual_reward ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'MinIndividualReward' AND $60) WHEN true THEN min_individual_reward ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'ValidUntil' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN valid_until ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'ValidUntil' AND $60) WHEN true THEN valid_until ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'ReportHash' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN report_hash ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'ReportHash' AND $60) WHEN true THEN report_hash ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'CreatedAt' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'CreatedAt' AND $60) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'ThumbsUpOnly' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN thumbs_up_only ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'ThumbsUpOnly' AND $60) WHEN true THEN thumbs_up_only ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'ForceHydrate' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN force_hydrate ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'ForceHydrate' AND $60) WHEN true THEN force_hydrate ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'TotalCollabs' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN total_collabs ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'TotalCollabs' AND $60) WHEN true THEN total_collabs ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'TotalSpent' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN total_spent ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'TotalSpent' AND $60) WHEN true THEN total_spent ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'TotalBudget' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN total_budget ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'TotalBudget' AND $60) WHEN true THEN total_budget ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'ImpressionCount' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN impression_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'ImpressionCount' AND $60) WHEN true THEN impression_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'ReplyCount' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN reply_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'ReplyCount' AND $60) WHEN true THEN reply_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'RepostCount' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN repost_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'RepostCount' AND $60) WHEN true THEN repost_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($59 = 'LikeCount' AND NOT $60) WHEN true THEN like_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($59 = 'LikeCount' AND $60) WHEN true THEN like_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $61 OFFSET $62
